meanings.sent1: The mislayers often forget where they put their keys.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the mislayers in our group because she always loses her phone.
meanings.sent3: The mislayers at the office have a habit of misplacing important documents.
meanings.sent4: The mislayers in the library seem to make books disappear like magic.
meanings.sent5: The mislayers in the family are always searching for their misplaced items.

meanings.sent1: I mislay my glasses almost every morning.
meanings.sent2: Please don't mislay the keys; we need them to open the door.
meanings.sent3: He tends to mislay his homework right before it's due.
meanings.sent4: The forgetful professor would mislay his notes before every lecture.
meanings.sent5: Try not to mislay your umbrella on a rainy day.
